name: MEGA MAN BATTLE NETWORK 5 TEAM COLONEL
name_original: MEGA MAN BATTLE NETWORK 5 TEAM COLONEL
description:
Dr. Regal and his cronies from Nebula HQ have returned and raided SciLab. It's up to Lan and Mega Man to return the stolen PETS to their rightful owners! Game content is the same for MEGA MAN BN 5 COLONEL and MEGA MAN BN 5 PROTOMAN, but NetNavi chips and other items may differ.

This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
